product.title: Acacia Amber
product.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 500mm max drop: 4000mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.

relproducts.title: Amor Ocean Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously.

relproducts.description: Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. relproducts.title: Amor Salmon Pink Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sweet as bubblegum and happy as a clam, the amor salmon pink is such a cheery accessory to any room. You will love it so much that from the day you put it up in your nursery it will be a slow and steady descent into pink madness until, one day, you wake up naked in a candy floss machine wondering how you let it get so bad. But that's ok. Because this pink works perfectly with neutral colours such as whites or dark greys as a loud, colourful statement piece that you physically can't tear your eyes from.

relproducts.title: Amor Soft Peach Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their range of blackout fabrics are perfect for blocking the light entering your room. Use these to give your room privacy whenever you need it. Especially when you order the amor soft peach, a perfectly peachy colour to cover your window. Being blackout, no light will be able to pass through the fabric making it perfect for living rooms and bedrooms. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

relproducts.title: Valencia Spring Green Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Full of the joys of spring this vivacious valencia spring green vertical blind will bring colour and life into your home. It's a rich, earthy tone that provides a natural element and will easily pair with grey neutrals or olive hues for a coordinated look. A vertical blind is the full of the joys of spring this vivacious valencia spring green vertical blind will bring colour and life into your home.

relproducts.title: Calaf Beige Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Here we have a pale beige vertical blind, its light enough in colour to be subtle at the window but still injects some colour into a design scheme. The pattern on the calaf fabric is inspired by the natural curved shape of a leaf and includes a soft sheen too. relproducts.title: Calaf Pearl Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Just like a pearl the colour of this blind is light cream, it will give the window area a light and airy feel. The pattern on the calaf fabric is inspired by the natural curved shape of a leaf and includes a soft sheen too. relproducts.title: Calaf White Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: To keep it fresh and bright at the window you wont go wrong with the calaf white vertical blind which is pure white. relproducts.title: Valencia Blue Grey Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Sleek and contemporary, this valencia blue grey vertical blind brings sophistication and bags of practicality. The toned down colourway is just as the name suggests, a chic blend of blue and grey that adds cool colour to a space without overwhelming your decor. That fabric is a sleek and contemporary, this valencia blue grey vertical blind brings sophistication and bags of practicality.
